required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Preliminary Efficacy of HC-1119 in Patients.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study Evaluating Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Preliminary Efficacy of HC-1119 in Patients With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer.

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I study evaluating tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and preliminary efficacy of HC-1119 in patients with metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer. The study objective is to study the tolerability, safety, and dose-limiting toxicities (DLT) of HC-1119 in patients with mCRPC.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose
From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under curve from time 0 to 24h (AUC0-24h)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose
From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with > 50% decrease in PSA levels from baseline during the 12-week treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Response rate of prostate specific antigen (PSA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose of the study to the 12th week after dose
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with > 50% decrease in PSA levels from baseline at weeks 6, 8, 10, and 12.

arm_group.description: Drug name L:HC-1119 Dosage: 40 mg, 80 mg, 160 mg, and 200 mg

facility.name: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd
